title: An Addition to Isaiah from the Book of Mormon
html:
In his work on Isaiah, Nyman noted a significant addition to Isaiah: “As Nephi commented onIsaiah 49 in1 Nephi 22 , he quoted or paraphrased three verses from ‘the prophet,’ obviously Isaiah. We do not have these verses in the present Bible text, but they fit very well into the context ofIsaiah 49 and 50. We can illustrate this by placing [1 Nephi 22:15–17 ] between the last verse of chapter 49 and the first verse of chapter 50.” (“Great Are the Words of Isaiah,” p. 191.)

LDS Church Educational System Old Testament Student Manual, 1 Kings–Malachi, Religion 302, Chapter 17, Item 10
